name: Eco-Friendly Water Bottle
text: A reusable stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours.

name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
text: Over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Smart Fitness Tracker
text: Tracks steps, heart rate, sleep, and workouts with a sleek OLED display.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
text: Portable speaker with deep bass, waterproof design, and 15-hour playtime.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
text: Adjustable chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and 360-degree swivel.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
text: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with blue switches and customizable keys.

name: Smartphone Gimbal
text: 3-axis handheld stabilizer for smooth video recording and motion tracking.

name: Electric Toothbrush
text: Rechargeable toothbrush with 5 cleaning modes and a 2-minute smart timer.

name: 4K Action Camera
text: Compact waterproof action camera with image stabilization and wide-angle lens.

name: Portable Power Bank
text: High-capacity 20,000mAh power bank with fast charging and dual USB ports.

name: Smart Home Hub
text: Voice-controlled hub that connects and automates lights, thermostats, and devices.

name: Drone with Camera
text: Quadcopter drone with 1080p HD camera, GPS return, and 25-minute flight time.

name: Gaming Mouse
text: Ergonomic wired gaming mouse with adjustable DPI and programmable buttons.

name: E-Reader
text: Lightweight e-reader with glare-free screen, adjustable brightness, and long battery life.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
text: Qi-certified fast wireless charger compatible with most smartphones.
